GR13kalhans_u:1: bhālaṃ vahniśikhāṅkitaṃ dadhad adhiśrotraṃ vahan saṃbhṛtakrīḍatkuṇḍalijṛmbhitaṃ jaladhijacchāyācchakaṇṭhacchaviḥ /
GR13kalhans_u:2: vakṣo bibhrad ahīnakañcukacitaṃ baddhāṅganārdhasya vo bhāgaḥ puṃgavalakṣmaṇo 'stu yaśase vāmo 'tha vā dakṣiṇaḥ // 1 [= RT 1.2] //
GR13kalhans_u:3: vāme sāñjanam akṣi dakṣiṇadiśi śyāmāyamāno galaḥ pāṇau tiṣṭhati darpaṇo 'tra mukuṭe 'mutra sthitaś candramāḥ /
GR13kalhans_u:4: tan māteyam ayaṃ piteti sucirāt sapratyabhijñaṃ śanair yasyotsaṅgam agād guho bhavatu vaḥ prītyai sa gaurīśvaraḥ // 2 //
GR13kalhans_u:5: muñcebhājinam asya kumbhakuhare muktāḥ kucāgrocitāḥ kiṃ bhālajvalanena kajjalam ataḥ kāryaṃ tavākṣṇoḥ kṛte /
GR13kalhans_u:6: saṃdhāne vapurardhayor bhagavator itthaṃ niṣedhe 'py aheḥ kartavye priyayottarānusaraṇodyukto haraḥ pātu vaḥ // 3 [= RT 3.1] //
GR13kalhans_u:7: vihitam ajagośṛṅgāgrābhyāṃ dhanur ghaṭitaṃ tathā narakaraṭinor dehārdhābhyāṃ gaṇaṃ parigṛhṇataḥ /
GR13kalhans_u:8: dvividharacanāvāllabhyānāṃ nidher ucitā vibhor jayati laṭabhāpuṃbhāgābhyāṃ śarīravinirmitiḥ // 4 [= RT 2.1] //
GR13kalhans_u:9: nedaṃ parṇasamīraṇāśanatapomāhātmyam ukṣoragau paśyaitāv ata eva saṃprati kṛtau tanmātravṛttī bahiḥ /
GR13kalhans_u:10: premṇaivārdham idaṃ carācaraguroḥ prāpeyam ātmastutīr itthaṃ devavadhūmukhāc chrutisukhāḥ śṛṇvaty aparṇāvatāt // 5 [= RT 6.1] //
GR13kalhans_u:11: kāpy eteṣu ruciḥ kaceṣu phaṇināṃ puṃskokilasyeva te gobhiḥ kaṇṭhataṭasya hṛṣyati puro dṛk paśya cakṣuḥśruteḥ /
GR13kalhans_u:12: saṃdhāne 'bhinave mitho bhagavator jihvāpṛthakspandinī bhinnārthāṃ sadṛśākṣarām api vadanty evaṃ giraṃ pātu vaḥ // 6 [= RT 5.1] //
GR13kalhans_u:13: dātuṃ vāñchati dakṣiṇe 'pi nayane vāmaḥ karaḥ kajjalaṃ bhaujaṅgaṃ ca bhuje 'ṅgadaṃ ghaṭayituṃ vāme 'pi vāmetaraḥ /
GR13kalhans_u:14: itthaṃ svaṃ svam aśikṣitaṃ bhagavator ardhaṃ vapuḥ paśyatoḥ sādhārasmitalāñchitaṃ diśatu vo vaktraṃ manovāñchitam // 7 //
GR13kalhans_u:15: gāḍhāliṅgana maṅgalaṃ bhavatu te svasty astu vaś cāṭavaḥ kiṃ brūmaḥ priyayā vilāsakalaha śraddheya evāsi na /
GR13kalhans_u:16: ity ukte nibiḍapravāsacakitair yāvad guṇaiḥ sthīyate saṃghaṭṭaḥ śivayoḥ sa tāvad adhikaspaṣṭaḥ śivāyāstu vaḥ // 8 //
GR13kalhans_u:17: tad ardhanārīśvaramūrdharatnam ardhaṃ vidhor astu samṛddhaye vaḥ /
GR13kalhans_u:19: tadvītavyatirekam adritanayādehena miśrībhavan niṣpratyūham iha vyapohatu vapuḥ sthāṇor abhadrāṇi vaḥ /
GR13kalhans_u:20: veṇyā bhogivadhūśarīrakuṭilaśyāmatviṣā veṣṭitā jūṭāher api yatra bhāti dayitāmūrtyeva pṛktā tanuḥ // 10 [= RT 4.1] //
GR13kalhans_u:21: prauḍhāḥ kañcukino jaradvṛṣavaraḥ kubjas tuṣāradyutir nityāpto 'pi bahiṣkṛtaḥ parikaraḥ so 'yaṃ samasto 'py aho /
GR13kalhans_u:22: ardhād yadvasatīkṛtād bhagavatā cāritracaryāvidā sā bhidyād duritaṃ carācaraguror antaḥpuraṃ pārvatī // 11 [= RT 8.1] //
GR13kalhans_u:24: paryāptātularāmaṇīyakamahāśrībhairavākārayoḥ kṣemaṃ vaḥ śivayoḥ samāsamadṛśor diśyād acintyaṃ vapuḥ // 12 //
GR13kalhans_u:25: cūḍendor iva rociṣā mukulitaṃ vātāyanābhaṃ śriyaḥ pānārthaṃ pariṣevitaṃ madhukarākāraiḥ kumārānanaiḥ /
GR13kalhans_u:26: aunnatyād adhivāsya vaktrapavanair ghrāṇopayogīkṛtaṃ kasyorojasarojam asti na manastoṣāya gaurīśayoḥ // 13 //
GR13kalhans_u:27: ardhaṃ snigdhavimugdham iddhahutabhugdigdhaṃ tathārdhaṃ jagat pāyād īśvarayos tad akṣi tilakasthānasthitaṃ vīkṣya yat /
GR13kalhans_u:28: krīḍākarmaṇi kārmukaṃ karatale kartuṃ kirīṭendunā sotsekaś ca nirutsukaś ca yugapad devaḥ smaro jāyate // 14 //
GR13kalhans_u:29: vyālā vāyubhujas tṛṇeḍhi ca tṛṇāny ukṣā bubhukṣāturo niṣkaupīnapaṭaḥ kuṭumbabharaṇo kiṃ tv asmi cintākulaḥ /
GR13kalhans_u:30: daurgatyād iti piṇḍam ekam akarod gaurīśarūpeṇa yo yaś cābhīṣṭaphalapradas trijagataḥ kasmaicid asmai namaḥ // 15 //
GR13kalhans_u:31: jyāghoṣair badhirīkaroti kakubho bāhū muhuḥ paśyati svasya svena vikatthate racayati proccaistarāṃ tarjanīm /
GR13kalhans_u:32: yasmin kevalam eva kelirabhasāj jāte 'rdhanārīśvare vīraṃmanyatayā sa manmathabhaṭo vātūlitas taṃ stumaḥ // 16 //
GR13kalhans_u:33: vapuḥkhaṇḍe khaṇḍaḥ prativasati śailendraduhituḥ śikhaṇḍe khaṇḍenduḥ svayam api vibhuḥ khaṇḍaparaśuḥ /
GR13kalhans_u:34: tathāpi pratyagraṃ śaraṇam upayātaṃ prati vibhor akhaṇḍo vyāpāro jagati karuṇāyā vijayate // 17 [= SKA 15.37] //
GR13kalhans_u:35: premnārdhaṃ vapuṣo vilokya militaṃ devyā samaṃ svāmino maulau yasya niśāpatir nagasutāveṇīniśāmiśritaḥ /
GR13kalhans_u:36: āste svāmyanuvartanārtham iva tat kṛtvā vapuḥ khaṇḍitaṃ deyād advayabhāvanāṃ sa bhagavān devo 'rdhanārīśvaraḥ // 18 [= ŚRT 1.1.2] //
